hero.label: Psychotherapy
hero.title: Slow down anxiety. Restore order to your life.
hero.subtitle: For high-pressure professionals, relationship struggles, and emotional rollercoasters—we offer structured, boundary-conscious, confidential counseling.

method.title: Session Format
method.desc: Both online and in-person. 50 minutes per session, typically weekly; can adjust to biweekly when stable.

approach.title: Therapeutic Approach
approach.desc: Integrative work drawing from CBT, ACT, psychoanalytic orientations—matched to your needs and stage.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.desc: Nothing shared without your written consent. Except where law requires (e.g., immediate risk), we follow strict ethical protocols.

whatYouGet.title: What You Can Expect
whatYouGet.desc: If you're stuck in chronic stress, conflict, anxiety, or self-criticism—we'll break it down into steps and gradually restore a sense of control and stability.

individual.title: Individual Therapy
individual.desc: Emotional distress, stress, trauma, self-worth, and life choices.

couple.title: Couple Counseling
couple.desc: Conflict patterns, communication, trust, and boundaries.

anxiety.title: Anxiety & Workplace Stress
anxiety.desc: For high-pressure professionals—sleep, hypervigilance, worries, burnout.

family.title: Family-of-Origin & Long-term Patterns
family.desc: Understanding how early relationships shape the present; rebuilding self-relationship and boundaries.

credentials.label: Credentials & Training
credentials.text: Nationally accredited counseling credentials; ongoing training in CBT, ACT, psychoanalytic approaches and clinical supervision.

approach.label: Approach
approach.text: Integrative: first stabilize emotions and daily functioning, then explore relational patterns and core beliefs.

values.label: Values
values.text: Respect, boundaries, non-judgment. You're not 'broken'—you're carrying difficulty and actively seeking a way forward.

workStyle.label: Working Style
workStyle.text: Goal-oriented + process-aware. Each phase clarifies goals, tracks progress, and plans next steps.

booking.title: Booking & Fees
steps: Submit your info (name/nickname, contact, brief concern).
15-min intro call to check fit and goals.
Schedule regular sessions, frequency, and phase goals.
booking.cancelPolicy: Cancellation: Please notify at least 24 hours ahead; late cancellations incur one session fee.
booking.paymentNote: E-transfer payment to the email above.

privacy.title: Privacy & Confidentiality
items: Your personal data is used only for booking, sessions, and necessary communication.
Records are kept minimal with strict access control.
No disclosure to family, employers, or third parties without your consent.
Only in legally required high-risk situations (e.g., imminent harm) do we follow mandated procedures.

items.q: What happens in the first session?
items.a: We clarify your main concerns, goals, and how we'll work together—so you know what to expect.
Therapy isn't about being persuaded. It's about understanding patterns and adjusting responses through a stable, structured relationship. Change grows from ongoing collaboration.

items.q: How many sessions do I need?
items.a: Short-term work often starts with 6–12 sessions. Deeper issues (long-term patterns, trauma) may need longer.
